resources.string: This app uses software licensed under the %1$s. Further information can be seen in the app\'s source code on %2$s.
Feel free to provide feedback (bugs, etc) and pull requests on %1$s. Also further documentation is available there.
This app has the same package of ActionBarSherlock: Demos because the library, to works, need a published app on Play Store. All credits to Jake Wharton\'s %1$s.
